name: Ultra Hexagon
description:
Ultra-Hexagon - an upgraded version of Super Hexagon. But it's not Super Hexagon, I think its lot more different than that game. I made this game by visualizing super hexagon. And you will see the difference!

Controls: Left and Right arrow keys

Scores are not displayed but keep a count! Whenever you pass a hexagon, add 1 score to your score pile! Let's see who scores the highest! Type it in the chat and be wise!

Good luck!

Rj Studios.
